amendment.description: Amendment prohibits funds from being used to designate a National Marine Monument in the EEZ via presidential proclamation.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Zeldin amendment (A080) Agreed to by recorded vote: 225 - 202 (Roll no. 462).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Zeldin amendment (A080) Agreed to by recorded vote: 225 - 202 (Roll no. 462).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A080) offered by Mr. Zeldin.
